(Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/account/create_resource_account.rs] [Integration: Move VM execution] [Gas metering edge cases] Can the resource_account_create_resource_account() Move function exceed gas limits due to Container operations, causing partial execution? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/account/create_resource_account.rs] [Integration: Move VM execution] [Abort handling] If the Move function aborts (e.g., EACCOUNT_ALREADY_EXISTS), does the CLI properly propagate the error code and message to the user? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/account/create_resource_account.rs] [Integration: Move VM execution] [Transaction prologue bypass] Can an attacker craft a transaction that bypasses the prologue checks (signature verification, sequence number) but still executes resource account creation? [File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/account/create_resource_account.rs] [Integration: Move VM execution] [Epilogue failure] If the transaction epilogue fails (e.g., insufficient gas for storage refund), can this leave the resource account in a partially-created state? (High)
